title: How hard is hard?
body: I go searching around...and pretty much all those threads have posts saying how hard it is... like pretty much every riven knows how to animation cancel and do the fast combo and not so every lee sin can do an insec. Like these "hard" things are pretty much just "average" and in the end it just comes down to practice(even tho knowledge gets u pretty far)...

replies.body:
Best RivenNA is great too https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6y7u3fDCWgI

Consistency is hard, BestRivenNA is consistently awesome at Riven :p
all prac and knowing your limits ++ knowledge about the diff between a good play and a sht play that looks good
But nobody knows the Strap-On Combo for {{champion:92}}
